column1: I’ll be on @seanhannity tonight with @SteveScalise and @DevinNunes... we’ll be talking about the stunning Dem hypocrisy with Iran. Tune in.
Sending prayers and support to my colleague John Lewis tonight. Hate the news. He’s as tough as he is determined. God bless him and his family.
Great numbers @mattgaetz highlighted. Look at the RCP average impeachment numbers since the Judiciary hearing started. It’s under water. Americans seeing through the farce. https://t.co/o4Z6HtAVcl

Friends wishing you all a Merry Christmas!  Isaiah 9:6 - “For unto us a Child is born unto us a Son is given; And the government will be upon His shoulders. And His name will be called Wonderful Counselor Mighty God Everlasting Father Prince of Peace.”

Chairman Schiff misled about collusion evidence misled about whistleblower contacts fabricated a @realDonaldTrump comment in a hearing and we now know from the IG report that his FISA memo was bunk. I’ll take a hard pass on this letter. https://t.co/W6wIMeN6L6

Still haven’t heard one good explanation from House Democrats trying to impeach @realDonaldTrump: in FIVE U.S.-Ukraine interactions between July and September 2019 how did this supposed political “quid pro quo” fantasy not come up even ONE time?  The reason is: it didn’t happen
Amazing. Great job Mark. God bless you Sgt. Corley! https://t.co/xUcAPfmgQ2

Brand new polls showing bad news for House Democrats impeachment.  USA Today: 41% support 56% oppose - under water by -15. Independents oppose by 11 points  Quinnipiac: 45% support 51% oppose. Independents oppose by 22 points 58-36.  Americans see through this.

Jim is right. I remember this segment and plenty others. Evidence of FISA abuse against President Trump’s campaign was right there if you were willing to read the documents. Many ignored it. https://t.co/O5GtBaJfQ1
About to join @marthamaccallum here in a few minutes talking new polls out today showing rising support for @realDonaldTrump against impeachment. 7:00pm. Hope you’ll tune in.
USA Today poll out today has more. Voters against impeachment 41-56. 15 points. Huge swing. Independents against impeachment by 11 points.   Trouble for House Democrats.
Wow. Quinnipiac poll out today shows impeachment underwater by -6 points 45-51. Independents oppose impeaching @realDonaldTrump by 22 points 58-36! Voters are seeing through the charade.

Chairman Schiff claiming he was unaware RE: evidence of FISA abuse. Malarkey. @DevinNunes memo laid out the evidence in detail. Schiff saw the same info Nunes @Jim_Jordan I and others did. He ignored it and continued to spread false innuendo about @realDonaldTrump anyway.
God bless our military men and women - greatest in the world. And bravo @realDonaldTrump for showing support! https://t.co/XK5AnAw6uv

Joining @seanhannity shortly around 9:05pm. We’ll discuss how the impeachment case against @realDonaldTrump yet again collapsed under questioning — and how it was again all based on a false assumption with no evidence.  Tune in.

Excellent work today from my colleagues @Jim_Jordan @RepChrisStewart @RepRatcliffe @RepMikeTurner @EliseStefanik and several others.   The Democrats' impeachment effort against @realDonaldTrump didn't just fail to advance today -- it took several steps back.

This morning's impeachment hearing: someone who has never met or spoken to @realDonaldTrump *interpreted* his call with Ukraine as a "demand." That interpretation is disputed by multiple others--including the witness sitting right next to him.  This is a farce.

So much of the Democrats' impeachment effort has revolved around unelected bureaucrats airing their policy grievances with the President.  America elected @realDonaldTrump. Not those bureaucrats.  If they disagree so strongly they should go put their name on a ballot. https://t.co/6Z6KheIODR

Adam Schiff and Democrats are denying GOP witnesses like the whistleblower claiming they want to prevent "sham investigations."  If they want to prevent a "sham investigation" they're far too late. Because a "sham" is what this entire episode has been. @realDonaldTrump https://t.co/3nrkJ9g9xs

We're seeing a common theme through these witness interviews:   The people who were closest to @realDonaldTrump consistently say there was absolutely NO link between military aid and political investigations.   This was about rooting out corruption and protecting taxpayer money.

Huge night for North Carolina. Massive win for @realDonaldTrump and conservative values. @DrGregMurphy1 and @jdanbishop CONGRATULATIONS on outstanding races and job well done—now let’s get to work! #NC09 #NC03 #NCpol
@jrodgouge7 All congrats to you on the hard work paying off. God bless you.

The Democrats want to hold Bill Barr in contempt for following the law careen toward baselessly impeaching @realDonaldTrump and are even calling in a Watergate convicted felon to try and do it. I’m on @IngrahamAngle at 10:15 to discuss. Tune in!
No collusion. No obstruction. @Jim_Jordan and I will be on with @seanhannity at 9:45pm reacting. Tune in.
As we’ve known all along: it was hardworking Americans who elected @realDonaldTrump—not Russians.  No collusion. No obstruction. It’s over.
If and when the “no collusion” verdict comes down you can expect the left to treat the Mueller result just like they treated the 2016 election result: they won’t accept it
NC-11 lost an incredible public servant in the line of duty 5 years ago today: Officer Jason Crisp. He is missed every day. Please lift up his family in your prayers. https://t.co/3jnHVnihS1
A fool and his money are soon parted https://t.co/WDIWbHAXgj
He can speak at a conference live on CSPAN but can’t come to Congress and tell the truth about whether he discussed secretly taping President Trump https://t.co/7GVfo0swLS
Good. Planned Parenthood shouldn’t get one red cent of taxpayer money. Really important move here and a promise kept from @POTUS. https://t.co/myT4CXKnxt

I’d like Andy McCabe to publicly answer for why the Obama intel community circulated (and leaked) an uncorroborated Democrat oppo research project and used it to open an investigation without ANY reliable intelligence to back it up https://t.co/p6XAN2Cy0S

Via @DailyCaller: 3 truths you won’t find in Andy McCabe’s book:  1) McCabe is a known liar and leaker  2) Rod Rosenstein has avoided transparency at every turn  3) Scores of evidence show top FBI and DOJ brass without basis targeted @realDonaldTrump https://t.co/h6gGqAjfmq
You would think McCabe would be able to keep his story straight for at least 48 hours. The lies keep falling apart. https://t.co/sClM4zHs71

I’ll be on with @JudgeJeanine tonight at 9:05 reacting to @POTUS’ @realDonaldTrump’s move to build the wall with legal executive authority and responding to Andy McCabe’s continued stream of untruths and convenient memory lapses

Two powerful moments from last night’s #SOTU:  1) @POTUS defending the sanctity of life in front of the nation  2) The President’s firm repudiation of socialism. “America will never be a socialist country.”
I’ll be joining @seanhannity tonight reacting to @POTUS’s #SOTU speech shortly after 11. Will be joining @Jim_Jordan and @SteveScalise. Hope you’ll tune in!

The idea of legalizing the killing of born alive babies should be treated exactly as it is: repugnant un-American and morally bankrupt to the core.   Every politician whether they’re in the Senate or elsewhere should stand up and reject this. Period. https://t.co/M3a7WouoJp
If you’re an even moderately pro-life activist in Virginia or anywhere in the country this should get you off your couch. Stomach turning. https://t.co/BnqmUMEHpO
